title: Sending Support Ticket made me lose my Main account
body: Hi, I made this account specifically to be able to post as I lost my account after writing a support ticket. What happened was my email service assigned to the account has shut down, so I decided to make a support ticket to make a new email for my account as I cannot change it normally as the old e-mail is defunct, after my first support ticket they said that I had to log out and do another ticket as a account recovery, I did that and since then I have not been able to access my account. My main account name is StrayInu with Username **[REDACTED]**. I had no issues login in before this, just because I wanted to update my email address I lost my main account, I mean, if it is such a difficulty to fix the email change, please at least change my account back how it was so I can have it back again, that is the account with my friend list, and gifts given to me by my close friends. I may be a bronze with a bronze account, but it is my account with my favorite name that I am deeply attached to. Please fix this.

replies.body:
We cannot address account recoveries here on the boards, but if you continue working with our specialists in a support ticket, we should be able to resolve this together. I had to redact your username since that information is sensitive and could help someone in compromising your account, so I'd recommend not posting it publicly again.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey It's me in my main account, Success! it turns out that the new e-mail was dumping my last attempts in the junk e-mail folder, now I got my main account back, thank you! 

P.S. I recommend a way to access tickets when not able to acess your account, because I could not see the status and unable to ask questions without creating another account. It was a frustrating experience.
